title: Bug 40800org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Text, method append(), bottom focusing error
description: Bug 40800org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Text, method append(), bottom focusing error
OB: When appending a line (or multiple) to the textwidget with append(), the lastlines do not get focused. Contrary to the win32 version, the GTK version alwaysstays at the top of all lines instead of focusing the bottom when an append()has been done.
